ClsC_92c407f3.class_description: Concepts describing the domain of sports and the act of taking part in them, including organized physical activities and engagement in those activities.
ClsC_92c407f3.evidence_excerpt: Organized physical activities and competitions, and the act of individuals taking part in sports activities.

members.entity_description: Organized physical activities and games, including competitions and events, that shape culture and society, promote values and social change, and have significant economic impact.
members.resolution_context: All mentions use the lowercase common noun “sports” in the same essay context, describing the same broad concept of organized physical activities and competitions and differing only in minor wording or type_hint.

members.entity_description: The act of individuals taking part in sports activities.
members.resolution_context: Through participation in sports, individuals learn important life skills such as teamwork, perseverance, and resilience.
